Cáin agus tosú ar obair
Most employees have their tax deducted from their salary by their employer
Is é an fostóir a asbhaineann cáin as tuarastal fhormhór na bhfostaithe
Find out what you need to know about tax when starting work
Faigh amach an méid a chaithfidh a bheith ar eolas agat faoi cháin nuair a thosaíonn tú ag obair
Social insurance contributions entitle you to a range of benefits administered by the Department of Social Protection
De thoradh ranníocaíochtaí árachais shóisialaigh bíonn tú i dteideal réimse leathan sochar atá riartha ag an Roinn Gnóthaí Sóisialacha agus Teaghlaigh
This document is in: Social Welfare > Irish social welfare system > Social insurance (PRSI)
This document is in: Leas Sóisialach > Córas Leasa Shóisialaigh na hÉireann > Árachas Sóisialach (ÁSPC)
Personal Public Service Number
Uimhir Phearsanta Seirbhíse Poiblí
Your Personal Public Service Number (PPS number) is a unique reference number that helps to you access social welfare benefits, public services and information in Ireland
Is uimhir shainiúil tagartha í d'Uimhir Phearsanta Seirbhíse Poiblí a chabhraíonn leat sochair agus eolas a fháil ó ghníomhaireachtaí seirbhíse poiblí in Éirinn
This document is in: Social Welfare > Irish social welfare system
This document is in: Leas Sóisialach > Córas Leasa Shóisialaigh na hÉireann
Universal Social Charge (USC)
Muirear Sóisialta Uilíoch (MSU)
The Universal Social Charge is a tax payable on gross income that came into effect on 1 January 2011
Is cáin é an Muirear Sóisialta Uilíoch (MSU) iníoctha ar ioncam comhlán a tháinig i bhfeidhm an 1 Eanáir 2011
This document is in: Money and Tax > Tax > Income tax
This document is in: Airgead agus Cáin > Cáin > Cáin ioncaim
